description.narrative: The project's expected results are: (i) to assess the implementation of the 2010 DTIS in Togo and lessons learnt; (ii) update the DTIS of 2010, taking into account recent evolutions in the socio economic context of Togo; (iii) undertake detailed sectorial analyses of the Strategy for Accelerated Growth and Employment Promotion (SCAPE); (iv) update the Action Matrix in light of the priority sectors and activities linked to the promotion of the informal sector, tourism, industry, trade facilitation, gender, communications, global value chains and the private sector; and (v) elaborate a Mid-Term Programme for the implementation of the updated Action Matrix and organization of a roundtable to mobilize resources.

The project's objective is to elaborate a strategic and operational document that contributes to the reinforcement of trade capacities, poverty reduction and sustainable development in Togo, taking into account the lessons learned from the 2010 DTIS and the implementation assessment of the DTIS Action Matrix and the EIF in Togo.

participating-org.narrative: Government of the Republic of Togo

provider-org.narrative: UNOPS helps the UN and its partners run peacebuilding, humanitarian and development operations for people in need.
UNOPS helps the UN and its partners run peacebuilding, humanitarian and development operations for people in need.
